title: If you could select any 4 or 5 dead musicians to form a band, which ones would you pick? - Quora

response.answer_text: Jerry Garcia - vocals, guitar, pedal steel, banjoRod “Pigpen” McKernan - vocals, harmonica, organLevon Helm - vocals, drums, mandolinRick Danko - vocals, bass, guitarRichard Manuel - vocals, piano, drumsJesse Ed Davis - guitar, piano5 vocalists who sang with a lot of soul, 2 great guitarists, a great drummer and bass player. I believe these guys would have blended together as a band extremely well and in fact would be a supergroup.

Easy one for me Songwriter - John Lennon (of the Beatles) - along with Paul, the most covered and successful songwriter in pop music history. Vocalist - Freddie Mercury (of Queen) - voted #1 rock vocalist of all time Guitarist - Jimi Hendrix - voted #1 rock guitarist of all time Bassist - John Entwistle (of the Who) - #1 rock bassist of all time Drummer - John Bonham (of Led Zeppelin) - top 3 (often #1) rock drummer of all time
